title: Verity
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Verity is a psychological thriller by Colleen Hoover that follows Lowen Ashleigh, a struggling writer who gets the opportunity of a lifetime when she is hired to finish a bestselling book series for Verity Crawford, a famous author who can no longer continue her work after a tragic accident. To complete the project, Lowen moves into the Crawford home to go through Verity’s notes and outlines, where she stumbles upon hidden writings that reveal unsettling details about Verity’s past, her family, and her marriage. As Lowen spends more time in the house, she becomes increasingly drawn to Jeremy, Verity’s husband, while at the same time struggling with the dark truths she uncovers, blurring the line between what is real, what is fiction, and who can be trusted.

title: The Mist
author: Stephen King
description: A gripping novella about a mysterious mist that envelops a small town, trapping a group of residents in a supermarket with terrifying creatures lurking outside.
